item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: Reading The Art of Statistics: Learning from Data - David Spiegelhalter [Link] The Checklist Manifesto: How To Get Things Right - Atul Gawande [Link] Completed Oct 2024 Poor - Katriona O’Sullivan - [Link] Bought this on a whim when I saw it as a Kindle special deal, and Iâ€™m glad I did. It covers what it means to be poor, and how some of the most vulnerable in society can fall through the cracks, how the system can let them down.
